Text.Page:
I...I didn't even hear it approach. I just turned around and there it wasâ€”the biggest, ugliest vulcan I've ever seen glaring down at me.

I'm not proud of what I did next, but what else could I do? I ran and I ran fast. Blast and damnation! How did it sneak up us?

That thing killed my comrades, my friends! It would have made mincemeat out me as well. But you...you can defeat the {@LinkCreature:29#8002#vulcan devastator} and its {@LinkCreature:29#4041#dreadnaughts}, right? Don't do it for me. I'm a worthless slug. Do it for my friends. They deserved better.

There's a keg of something tasty waiting for you if I ever get home to Castanica, . I'll have it sent to wherever you're deployed.

Well fought and well done!
